Theatrum redivivum, or, The theatre vindicated by Sir Richard Baker, in answer to Mr. Pryn's Histrio-mastix ... Theatrum redivivum Baker, Richard, Sir, 1568-1645.
[8], 141 p.
Printed by T.R. for Francis Eglesfield ..., London : 1662.
Reissued in 1670, with title: Theatrum triumphans, or, A discourse of plays. Reproduction of original in British Library.
=======

[8], 141 p.
Printed by T.R. for Francis Eglesfield ..., London : 1662.
Reissued in 1670, with title: Theatrum triumphans, or, A discourse of plays. Reproduction of original in British Library.
